00038 class KviDnsResolver;

00041 
00042 //
00043 // This class implements a HTTP protocol client.
00044 // It's able to send GET, POST and HEAD requests,
00045 // download stuff to a file or to a qt SLOT().
00046 //
00047 
00048 // FIXME: Document and hide internals.
00049 
00050 class KviHttpRequestPrivate;
00051 
00052 class KVILIB_API KviHttpRequest : public QObject, public KviHeapObject
00053 {
00054         Q_OBJECT
00055 public:
00056 
00057         enum ProcessingType
00058         {
00059                 HeadersOnly,    // Download headers only (HEAD request)
00060                 WholeFile,      // Emit the data as whole file (binaryData() is emitted)
00061                 Blocks,         // Emit the data as blocks (binaryData() is emitted)
00062                 Lines,          // Emit the data as ASCII text lines (the client must take care of decoding the data)
00063                 StoreToFile     // Store the data to a file
00064         };
00065 
00066         enum ExistingFileAction
00067         {
00068                 Overwrite,      // Overwrite existing file
00069                 RenameIncoming, // Automatically rename the incoming file
00070                 RenameExisting, // Automatically rename the existing file
00071                 Resume          // Attempt to resume the file (get partial content)
00072         };
00073 
00074 public:
00075 
00076         KviHttpRequest();
00077 
00078         virtual ~KviHttpRequest();
00079 
00080 protected:
00081         // data
00082         KviUrl                 m_url;
00083         QString                m_szFileName;
00084         ProcessingType         m_eProcessingType;
00085         ExistingFileAction     m_eExistingFileAction;
00086         void                 * m_pPrivateData;
00087         unsigned int           m_uMaxContentLength;
00088         unsigned int           m_uContentOffset;
00089         QString                m_szPostData;
00090         // status
00091         QString                m_szLastError;
00092         unsigned int           m_uTotalSize;
00093         unsigned int           m_uReceivedSize;
00094         // internal status
00095         bool                   m_bHeaderProcessed;
00096         bool                   m_bChunkedTransferEncoding;
00097         bool                   m_bGzip;
00098         unsigned int           m_uRemainingChunkSize;
00099         bool                   m_bIgnoreRemainingData; // used in chunked transfer after the last chunk has been seen
00100         unsigned int           m_uConnectionTimeout; // in seconds, 60 secs by default
00101 
00102 private:
00103 
00104         KviHttpRequestPrivate * m_p;
00105 
00106 public:
00107 
00108         void setConnectionTimeout(unsigned int uConnectionTimeout)
00109         {
00110                 m_uConnectionTimeout = uConnectionTimeout;
00111                 if(m_uConnectionTimeout < 5)
00112                         m_uConnectionTimeout = 5; // keep it sane
00113         }
00114 
00115         const KviUrl & url(){ return m_url; };
00116         ProcessingType processingType(){ return m_eProcessingType; };
00117         ExistingFileAction existingFileAction(){ return m_eExistingFileAction; };
00118         const QString &fileName(){ return m_szFileName; };
00119         void * privateData(){ return m_pPrivateData; };
00120         unsigned int maxContentLength(){ return m_uMaxContentLength; };
00121         unsigned int contentOffset(){ return m_uContentOffset; };
00122         unsigned int totalSize(){ return m_uTotalSize; };
00123         unsigned int receivedSize(){ return m_uReceivedSize; };
00124 
00125         void reset();
00126 
00127         void setPostData(const QString &szPostData){ m_szPostData = szPostData; };
00128         void setUrl(const KviUrl &u){ m_url = u; };
00129         void setProcessingType(ProcessingType t){ m_eProcessingType = t; };
00130         void setExistingFileAction(ExistingFileAction a){ m_eExistingFileAction = a; };
00131         void setFileName(const QString &szFileName){ m_szFileName = szFileName; };
00132         void setPrivateData(void * ptr){ m_pPrivateData = ptr; };
00133         void setMaxContentLength(int uMaxContentLength){ m_uMaxContentLength = uMaxContentLength; }; //0 means unlimited
00134         // this will work regardless of ExistingFileAction : even if the file doesn't exist
00135         void setContentOffset(int uContentOffset){ m_uContentOffset = uContentOffset; };
00136 
00137         bool start();
00138 
00139         // this is a shortcut for reset()+setUrl()+setProcessingType()+setFileName()+start()
00140         bool get(const KviUrl &u,ProcessingType p = WholeFile,const QString &szFileName = QString());
00141 
00142         const QString & lastError(){ return m_szLastError; };
00143 
00144         void abort();
00145 signals:
00146         void resolvingHost(const QString &hostname);
00147         void contactingHost(const QString &ipandport);
00148         void connectionEstabilished();
00149         void receivedResponse(const QString &response);
00150 
00151         void terminated(bool bSuccess);
00152 
00153         void status(const QString &message);
00154         void data(const KviCString &data);
00155         void binaryData(const KviDataBuffer &data);
00156         void header(KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviCString> * hdr);
00157         void requestSent(const QStringList &request);
00158 
00159 private:
00160         void closeSocket();
00161         bool doConnect();
00162 
00163         void processData(KviDataBuffer * data);
00164         bool processHeader(KviCString &szHeader);
00165         bool openFile();
00166         void emitLines(KviDataBuffer * pDataBuffer);
00167 
00168         void resetStatus();
00169         void resetData();
00170         void resetInternalStatus();
00171 
00172 private slots:
00173         void slotSocketReadDataReady();
00174         void slotSocketDisconnected();
00175         void slotSocketConnected();
00176         void slotSocketError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError socketError);
00177         void slotConnectionTimedOut();
00178         void slotSocketHostResolved();
00179 };
